title: Apply user-provided logo everywhere and restore the previous theme
constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Keep the existing SolviroStudio brand gradient utility classes available and working: .brand-gradient-bg and .brand-gradient-text
Do not route or serve images through the backend; use static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated
Backend must remain single-actor (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo); only add backend migration if strictly required by state changes
nonGoals: Introduce new sections, navigation items, or copy changes beyond ensuring the logo replacement and old theme restoration are applied
Add new authentication methods beyond Internet Identity
Add new backend features unrelated to logo/theme
